section.title: Handling nil
section.para: Using nil in expressions needs to be done with special care since nil is no ordinary value which can be processed further.
If a function might return nil, the caller must be prepared to handle this return value. This is done by checking for (in)equality with nil.
There are some builtin functions which know how to cope with nil, but this is an exception. Usually, a nil value in an expression yields the complete expression to nil.
